sense.gloss: pleasure and pain, joys and sorrows

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑貴方↑↓あなた↓と|↑苦楽|↑↓くらく↓を↑共↑↓とも↓にしよう。
sdata.e: I'll share both troubles and joys with you.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑貴方↑↓あなた↓と|↑苦楽|↑↓くらく↓を↑共↑↓とも↓にしよう。
sdata.e: I'll go through both the good times and the bad with you.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑貴方↑↓あなた↓と|↑苦楽|↑↓くらく↓を↑共↑↓とも↓にしよう。
sdata.e: I'll stay with you through both the happy times and the sad times.
